languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, боюсь, у меня недобрые вести. Бездонная чернота разлилась по холсту, разделив надвое единое целое — и взор мой не видит боле света {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} столь же отчетливо, как раньше. Я не могу обернуться, кисть... ведет меня только вперед. Путь закрыт".

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец, боюсь, у меня недобрые вести. Бездонная чернь разлилась по холсту, разделив надвое единое целое — и взор мой не видит боле света {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} столь же отчетливо, как раньше. Я не могу обернуться, кисть... ведет меня только вперед. Путь закрыт".

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, I fear I have unfortunate news. Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, боюсь, у меня недобрые вести. Бездонная чернота разлилась по холсту, разделив надвое единое целое — и взор мой не видит боле света {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} столь же отчетливо, как раньше. Я не могу обернуться, кисть... ведет меня только вперед. Путь закрыт".

Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

"Rogue Trader, I fear I have unfortunate news. Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

"Rogue Trader, I fear I have unfortunate news. Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

languages.text: “行商浪人，我恐怕有个不幸的消息要告诉你。无尽的黑色在画布上蔓延，将本该完整的东西一分为二。我的视线已经无法再像以前那样清晰地看到{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的光芒。我无法转身，我的画笔……拖着我继续前进，前路已经被堵死。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I fear I have unfortunate news. Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，我恐怕有个不幸的消息要告诉你。无尽的黑色在画布上蔓延，将本该完整的东西一分为二。我的视线已经无法再像以前那样清晰地看到{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的光芒。我无法转身，我的画笔……拖着我继续前进，前路已经被堵死。”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者、残念なお知らせがございます。果てしない黒がキャンバスに広がり、全体であるべきものを2つに分断してしまっております。そして、あたくしの視覚は以前のようにはっきりと{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の光を垣間見ることができません。振り返ることもできず、筆はただひたすらあたくしを前に向かわせるのです。道は閉ざされております」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I fear I have unfortunate news. Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグ・トレーダー、残念なお知らせがあります。果てしない黒がキャンバスに広がり、全体であるべきものを2つに分断してしまっています。そして、私の視覚は以前のようにはっきりと{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の光を垣間見ることができません。振り返ることもできず、筆はただひたすら私を前に向かわせるのです。道は閉ざされています」
「自由開拓者、残念なお知らせがございます。果てしない黒がキャンバスに広がり、全体であるべきものを2つに分断してしまっております。そして、あたくしの視覚は以前のようにはっきりと{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の光を垣間見ることができません。振り返ることもできず、筆はただひたすらあたくしを前に向かわせるのです。道は閉ざされております」

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich fürchte, ich habe schlechte Nachrichten. Unendliche Schwärze hat sich auf der Leinwand ausgebreitet und das, was ein Ganzes sein sollte, zweigeteilt – und mein Blick erfasst das Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} nicht so klar wie zuvor. Ich kann mich nicht umdrehen, mein Pinsel ... zieht mich nur weiter. Der Weg ist blockiert."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I fear I have unfortunate news. Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich fürchte, ich habe schlechte Nachrichten. Unendliche Schwärze hat sich auf der Leinwand ausgebreitet und das, was ein Ganzes sein sollte, zweigeteilt – und mein Blick erfasst das Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} nicht so klar wie zuvor. Ich kann mich nicht umdrehen, mein Pinsel ... zieht mich nur weiter. Der Weg ist blockiert."

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, je crains que les nouvelles ne soient pas bonnes. Une noirceur infinie s'est répandue sur la toile, et ce qui devait être un tout est désormais scindé... je ne perçois plus la lumière de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} aussi clairement qu'autrefois. Il m'est impossible de faire demi-tour, mon pinceau ne me guide... que vers l'avant. La voie est bloquée. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I fear I have unfortunate news. Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

traits.locale_text: « {Mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, je crains que les nouvelles ne soient pas bonnes. Une noirceur infinie s'est répandue sur la toile, et ce qui devait être un tout est désormais scindé... je ne perçois plus la lumière de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} aussi clairement qu'autrefois. Il m'est impossible faire demi-tour, mon pinceau ne me guide... que vers l'avant. La voie est bloquée. »

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, me temo que tengo malas noticias. Una oscuridad sin fin se ha extendido por el lienzo, dividiendo en dos lo que debería estar unido, y mi vista no atisba la luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} con la claridad de antes. No puedo girarme, mi pincel... solo me lleva adelante. El camino está bloqueado».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I fear I have unfortunate news. Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, me temo que tengo malas noticias. Una oscuridad sin fin se ha extendido por el lienzo, dividiendo en dos lo que debería estar unido, y mi vista no atisba la luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} con la claridad de antes. No puedo girarme, mi pincel... solo me lleva adelante. El camino está bloqueado».

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, maalesef kötü haberlerim var. Tuvale sonsuz bir siyahlık yayıldı, bütün olması gerekeni ikiye böldü ve... Gözlerim {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} ışığını eskisi kadar net seçemiyor. Geri dönemiyorum, fırçam... Beni yalnızca ileri doğru itiyor. Yol kapalı."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I fear I have unfortunate news. Endless blackness has spread across the canvas, dividing what should be whole in two — and my sight cannot glimpse the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} as clearly as before. I cannot turn around, my brush... only draws me onward. The way is blocked."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, maalesef kötü haberlerim var. Tuvale sonsuz bir siyahlık yayıldı, bütün olması gerekeni ikiye böldü ve... Gözlerim {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un ışığını eskisi kadar net seçemiyor. Geri dönemiyorum, fırçam... Beni yalnızca ileri doğru itiyor. Yol kapalı."
